name: Happy Smoothies
description:
HAPPY SMOOTHIES

You just opened a smoothie shop, and the community is coming to support the realization of their long time dream. Through their orders, you learn more about the customers' backstories and relationships to each other.

CONTROLS

Move: WASD

Interact with objects: E

Dialogue interaction: Mouse

CREDITS

AkaSei - Character and UI Design

Ashley Cho - Programming

Calamity - Writing & Narrative

Davor Majdandzic - Composer

Eliana - Sound Design

Nathan Garduno - Environmental Art and Lighting Design

Created for Wholesome Game Jam 2022
